if(searchTerm){filteredJobs=filteredJobs.filter(job=>job.title.toLowerCase().includes(searchTerm.toLowerCase())||job.company.toLowerCase().includes(searchTerm.toLowerCase())||job.skills.some(skill=>skill.toLowerCase().includes(searchTerm.toLowerCase())));}// 按筛选条件过滤
if(filters.length>0){filteredJobs=filteredJobs.filter(job=>{return filters.some(filter=>{switch(filter){case'ux-designer':return job.title.toLowerCase().includes('ux')||job.title.toLowerCase().includes('designer');case'ui-designer':return job.title.toLowerCase().includes('ui')||job.title.toLowerCase().includes('designer');case'product-designer':return job.title.toLowerCase().includes('product')&&job.title.toLowerCase().includes('designer');case'visual-identity':return job.title.toLowerCase().includes('visual')||job.title.toLowerCase().includes('graphic');default:return false;}});});}return{jobs:filteredJobs,total:filteredJobs.length,page:1,hasMore:false};};// 模拟从WeWorkRemotely获取工作的函数
export const fetchWeWorkRemotelyJobs=async()=>{// 这里可以实现真实的API调用
// 由于跨域和API限制，这里使用模拟数据
return mockJobs.filter(job=>job.location.includes('Remote'));};// 模拟从LinkedIn获取工作的函数
export const fetchLinkedInJobs=async()=>{// 这里可以实现真实的API调用
// 由于LinkedIn API的限制，这里使用模拟数据
return mockJobs.filter(job=>job.type==='Full-time');};

sourcesContent:
export const mockJobs = [
  {
    id: 1,
    title: 'Senior Frontend Developer (React)',
    company: 'Buffer',
    companyLogo: 'https://logo.clearbit.com/buffer.com',
    location: 'Remote - Global',
    type: 'Full-time',
    salary: 120,
    team: 'Engineering',
    postedDate: 'Today',
    views: 324,
    applicants: 12,
    description: 'Join our distributed team to build beautiful, intuitive interfaces for millions of users worldwide. Work with React, TypeScript, and modern web technologies.',
    skills: ['React', 'TypeScript', 'JavaScript', 'CSS', 'Node.js'],
    source: 'Mock Data',
    sourceUrl: 'https://buffer.com/careers',
    minimumQualifications: [
      'Bachelor\'s degree in Computer Science, related field, or equivalent practical experience',
      '5+ years of experience in frontend development',
      'Strong proficiency with React and modern JavaScript',
      'Experience with responsive design and cross-browser compatibility',
      'Excellent problem-solving skills and attention to detail'
    ],
    preferredQualifications: [
      'Strong collaboration and communication skills',
      'Experience with state management libraries (Redux, MobX, etc.)',
      'Experience with testing frameworks (Jest, React Testing Library)',
      'Contributions to open source projects',
      'Experience working in a remote environment'
    ],
    aboutJob: "At Buffer, we're building the premier social media management platform for businesses, influencers, and agencies around the world. Our engineering team is fully distributed across multiple time zones, allowing us to bring together the best talent from around the globe. We value transparency, collaboration, and a healthy work-life balance.\n\nAs a Senior Frontend Developer, you'll be responsible for building and maintaining key features of our web application, collaborating with designers to implement beautiful user interfaces, and mentoring junior developers. You'll have the opportunity to work on challenging problems and make a significant impact on our product and millions of users.",
    companyInfo: "Buffer is a fully remote team of 85+ people helping over 140,000 customers build their brands and grow their businesses on social media. We value transparency, inclusivity, and work-life balance. Our team members work from all around the world, from New Zealand to California."
  },
  {
    id: 2,
    title: 'Product Designer - Remote',
    company: 'GitLab',
    companyLogo: 'https://logo.clearbit.com/gitlab.com',
    location: 'Remote - Worldwide',
    type: 'Full-time',
    salary: 110,
    team: 'Product Design',
    postedDate: '2 days ago',
    views: 456,
    applicants: 28,
    description: 'Design user experiences for the world\'s largest all-remote company. Work on DevOps tools used by millions of developers.',
    skills: ['Figma', 'User Research', 'Prototyping', 'Design Systems'],
    minimumQualifications: [
      '3+ years of experience in product design',
      'Strong portfolio demonstrating UX/UI design skills',
      'Experience with design systems and component libraries',
      'Proficiency with modern design tools (Figma, Sketch)',
      'Ability to work in a remote, asynchronous environment'
    ],
    preferredQualifications: [
      'Experience with developer tools or DevOps products',
      'Understanding of Git workflows and version control concepts',
      'Experience with user research and usability testing',
      'Familiarity with agile development processes',
      'Contributions to open source design projects'
    ],
    aboutJob: "At GitLab, we're building a complete DevOps platform delivered as a single application, fundamentally changing the way Development, Security, and Ops teams collaborate. As a Product Designer, you'll work on creating intuitive interfaces for complex workflows, making powerful developer tools accessible to users of all skill levels.\n\nYou'll collaborate with product managers, engineers, and other designers in a fully remote environment, with the freedom to contribute from anywhere in the world. Your designs will directly impact millions of developers who use GitLab every day.",
    companyInfo: "GitLab is the world's largest all-remote company with team members in more than 65 countries. We believe that great ideas can come from anywhere, and we value transparency, collaboration, and iteration in everything we do. Our mission is to make it so that everyone can contribute, and we're building a platform that enables teams to collaborate more effectively in the software development process."
  },
  {
    id: 3,
    title: 'Full Stack Engineer',
    company: 'Zapier',
    companyLogo: 'https://logo.clearbit.com/zapier.com',
    location: 'Remote - US/Canada',
    type: 'Full-time',
    salary: 130,
    team: 'Engineering',
    postedDate: '3 days ago',
    views: 289,
    applicants: 19,
    description: 'Build and maintain the automation platform that connects 5000+ apps. Work with Python, JavaScript, and cloud technologies.',
    skills: ['Python', 'JavaScript', 'AWS', 'Docker', 'PostgreSQL'],
    source: 'Mock Data',
    sourceUrl: 'https://zapier.com/jobs'
  },
  {
    id: 4,
    title: 'DevOps Engineer - Remote',
    company: 'Automattic',
    companyLogo: 'https://logo.clearbit.com/automattic.com',
    location: 'Remote - Global',
    type: 'Full-time',
    salary: 125,
    team: 'Infrastructure',
    postedDate: '1 week ago',
    views: 567,
    applicants: 34,
    description: 'Help scale WordPress.com and other Automattic products. Work with Kubernetes, Docker, and cloud infrastructure.',
    skills: ['Kubernetes', 'Docker', 'AWS', 'Linux', 'Monitoring'],
    source: 'Mock Data',
    sourceUrl: 'https://automattic.com/work-with-us'
  },
  {
    id: 5,
    title: 'Content Marketing Manager',
    company: 'ConvertKit',
    companyLogo: 'https://logo.clearbit.com/convertkit.com',
    location: 'Remote - US',
    type: 'Full-time',
    salary: 85,
    team: 'Marketing',
    postedDate: '4 days ago',
    views: 234,
    applicants: 41,
    description: 'Create compelling content that helps creators grow their audience. Work with a fully remote team passionate about creator economy.',
    skills: ['Content Strategy', 'SEO', 'Email Marketing', 'Analytics'],
    source: 'Mock Data',
    sourceUrl: 'https://convertkit.com/careers'
  },
  {
    id: 6,
    title: 'Senior Backend Developer',
    company: 'Basecamp',
    companyLogo: 'https://logo.clearbit.com/basecamp.com',
    location: 'Remote - Americas',
    type: 'Full-time',
    salary: 140,
    team: 'Engineering',
    postedDate: '5 days ago',
    views: 445,
    applicants: 22,
    description: 'Work on the backend systems that power Basecamp and HEY. Ruby on Rails, PostgreSQL, and Redis in a calm, sustainable environment.',
    skills: ['Ruby on Rails', 'PostgreSQL', 'Redis', 'API Design'],
    source: 'Mock Data',
    sourceUrl: 'https://basecamp.com/about/jobs'
  },
  {
    id: 7,
    title: 'UX Researcher - Remote',
    company: 'Doist',
    companyLogo: 'https://logo.clearbit.com/doist.com',
    location: 'Remote - Europe/Americas',
    type: 'Full-time',
    salary: 95,
    team: 'Product',
    postedDate: '1 week ago',
    views: 178,
    applicants: 15,
    description: 'Conduct user research for Todoist and Twist. Help millions of users be more productive through evidence-based design decisions.',
    skills: ['User Research', 'Data Analysis', 'Usability Testing', 'Survey Design'],
    source: 'Mock Data',
    sourceUrl: 'https://doist.com/careers'
  },
  {
    id: 8,
    title: 'Customer Success Manager',
    company: 'Help Scout',
    companyLogo: 'https://logo.clearbit.com/helpscout.com',
    location: 'Remote - US',
    type: 'Full-time',
    salary: 75,
    team: 'Customer Success',
    postedDate: '6 days ago',
    views: 312,
    applicants: 38,
    description: 'Help our customers succeed with Help Scout. Build relationships, provide strategic guidance, and ensure customer satisfaction.',
    skills: ['Customer Success', 'SaaS', 'Communication', 'Data Analysis'],
    source: 'Mock Data',
    sourceUrl: 'https://www.helpscout.com/company/careers'
  },
  {
    id: 9,
    title: 'Mobile Developer (React Native)',
    company: 'Toggl',
    companyLogo: 'https://logo.clearbit.com/toggl.com',
    location: 'Remote - Global',
    type: 'Full-time',
    salary: 105,
    team: 'Mobile Engineering',
    postedDate: '3 days ago',
    views: 267,
    applicants: 16,
    description: 'Build and maintain mobile apps for time tracking and project management. Work with React Native and native iOS/Android development.',
    skills: ['React Native', 'iOS', 'Android', 'JavaScript', 'Mobile UI'],
    source: 'Mock Data',
    sourceUrl: 'https://toggl.com/jobs'
  },
  {
    id: 10,
    title: 'Data Scientist - Remote',
    company: 'Ghost',
    companyLogo: 'https://logo.clearbit.com/ghost.org',
    location: 'Remote - Worldwide',
    type: 'Full-time',
    salary: 115,
    team: 'Data & Analytics',
    postedDate: '1 week ago',
    views: 389,
    applicants: 25,
    description: 'Analyze user behavior and content performance on the Ghost publishing platform. Work with large datasets and machine learning.',
    skills: ['Python', 'SQL', 'Machine Learning', 'Statistics', 'Data Visualization'],
    source: 'Mock Data',
    sourceUrl: 'https://ghost.org/careers'
  },
  {
    id: 11,
    title: 'Technical Writer',
    company: 'Notion',
    companyLogo: 'https://logo.clearbit.com/notion.so',
    location: 'Remote - US/Europe',
    type: 'Full-time',
    salary: 90,
    team: 'Documentation',
    postedDate: '2 days ago',
    views: 156,
    applicants: 29,
    description: 'Create clear, comprehensive documentation for Notion\'s API and developer tools. Help developers build amazing integrations.',
    skills: ['Technical Writing', 'API Documentation', 'Developer Tools', 'Markdown'],
    source: 'Mock Data',
    sourceUrl: 'https://www.notion.so/careers'
  },
  {
    id: 12,
    title: 'Sales Development Representative',
    company: 'Airtable',
    companyLogo: 'https://logo.clearbit.com/airtable.com',
    location: 'Remote - US',
    type: 'Full-time',
    salary: 65,
    team: 'Sales',
    postedDate: '4 days ago',
    views: 203,
    applicants: 52,
    description: 'Generate and qualify leads for Airtable\'s enterprise sales team. Work with a modern sales stack and collaborative team.',
    skills: ['Sales', 'Lead Generation', 'CRM', 'Communication', 'Prospecting'],
    source: 'Mock Data',
    sourceUrl: 'https://airtable.com/careers'
  }
];

// 模拟从外部API获取工作数据的函数
export const fetchJobsFromAPI = async (searchTerm = '', filters = []) => {
  // 模拟API调用延迟
  await new Promise(resolve => setTimeout(resolve, 1000));
  
  let filteredJobs = [...mockJobs];
  
  // 按搜索词过滤
  if (searchTerm) {
    filteredJobs = filteredJobs.filter(job => 
      job.title.toLowerCase().includes(searchTerm.toLowerCase()) ||
      job.company.toLowerCase().includes(searchTerm.toLowerCase()) ||
      job.skills.some(skill => skill.toLowerCase().includes(searchTerm.toLowerCase()))
    );
  }
  
  // 按筛选条件过滤
  if (filters.length > 0) {
    filteredJobs = filteredJobs.filter(job => {
      return filters.some(filter => {
        switch (filter) {
          case 'ux-designer':
            return job.title.toLowerCase().includes('ux') || job.title.toLowerCase().includes('designer');
          case 'ui-designer':
            return job.title.toLowerCase().includes('ui') || job.title.toLowerCase().includes('designer');
          case 'product-designer':
            return job.title.toLowerCase().includes('product') && job.title.toLowerCase().includes('designer');
          case 'visual-identity':
            return job.title.toLowerCase().includes('visual') || job.title.toLowerCase().includes('graphic');
          default:
            return false;
        }
      });
    });
  }
  
  return {
    jobs: filteredJobs,
    total: filteredJobs.length,
    page: 1,
    hasMore: false
  };
};

// 模拟从WeWorkRemotely获取工作的函数
export const fetchWeWorkRemotelyJobs = async () => {
  // 这里可以实现真实的API调用
  // 由于跨域和API限制，这里使用模拟数据
  return mockJobs.filter(job => job.location.includes('Remote'));
};

// 模拟从LinkedIn获取工作的函数
export const fetchLinkedInJobs = async () => {
  // 这里可以实现真实的API调用
  // 由于LinkedIn API的限制，这里使用模拟数据
  return mockJobs.filter(job => job.type === 'Full-time');
};
